pr_title: Fix all spelling errors in yarn* since 1.16

timeline.bodyText: This is called gpu_warnlist.json, where the snake case suggest "warnlist" is a whole thing I guess?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
Agreed, this seems to be along the lines of whitelist which remains a single word:

  
    
      yarn/mappings/net/minecraft/server/PlayerManager.mapping
    
    
         Line 11
      in
      097b138
    
    
    
    

        
          
           FIELD field_14352 whitelistEnabled Z
replies.author: haykam821
